page.title: 08GARDENING IN SUNNINGDALE
page.content: There is flourishing Gardening Society which meets in the Women's Institute hut inthe recreation ground.There are nearly 100 members,aged from 20 to 80.the Society was started in 1940 and meets once a month. Many members grow flowers and are interested in flower arranging.They also grow vegetables,especially brassicas,which grow well in the light sandy soil.They often have lectures on gardening and hold quizzes and have a special celebration at Christmas. Some of the members had allotments so that 26 new houses could be built.The society were very glad that the attempt was unsuccessful. There are plenty of garden centres in the area where they can buy the supplies they need.
